actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Yosemite National Park in California as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in Yosemite National Park in California as wilderness. States that the wilderness areas so designated shall be known as the Yosemite South Wilderness and the Yosemite North Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Yosemite National Park in California as wilderness.
